accuracy.description: The correctness of the solution, measured as a boolean value indicating whether the provided answer is accurate or not.

completeness.description: The extent to which the solution covers all necessary steps in problem-solving, measured as a percentage.

conciseness.description: The efficiency in expressing the solution, measured by the number of steps or length of the explanation.

clarity.description: The ease of understanding the provided solution, measured by the quality of explanations and formatting.

response_time.description: The time taken to provide the solution, measured in seconds.
